channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.3.0-rc.1)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.3.0-rc.1)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.3.0-rc.1 - 2023-08-10 # Added # Remove always disabled objects #278 The new Remove Mesh By Blend Shape component removes mesh data based on blend shapes. #275 Option to process Make Children before modular avatar #296 Changed # Use UnityEditor api to compress texture #276 This also adds some supported texture formats.
